title: ATIT Engineering Industries
description: Atit Engineering Industries Pvt. Ltd. stands as one of India's leading manufacturers of Fluid Transmission Pipes (FTPs), with a legacy of over 42 years in the original equipment manufacturing (OEM) industry, serving the tractor and locomotive sectors.
results: Serves renowned clients like Mahindra & Mahindra Ltd, TMTL (Eicher), Alstom
Exports furniture goods to Tanzania, East Africa
Plans to achieve Public Limited status by 2028

title: Axis Electrical Components
description: Axis is a leading Indian manufacturer and exporter of high-quality electrical components, focusing on innovation in Lightning Protection, IoT solutions, and products complying with international standards.
results: First in India to get UL 467 certified for Earthing & Grounding Equipment
Executed $10 million order for Rural Electrification in East Africa
CRISIL SE 1A rating for High Financial Strength
Moved to SAP platform for quality management

title: Beacon Diagnostics Group
description: The Beacon Group is India's best IVD manufacturer, ISO-certified and trusted in 90+ countries for biochemistry, hematology, immunology, electrolyte analyzer, and serology reagents.

title: Gamma Tech India
description: Gamma Tech (India) Private Limited, a subsidiary of Kanam Latex Industries Pvt Ltd, focuses on innovation in radiation processing and Gamma irradiation for sterilization of medical and agro products.
results: Market leader in India for high-quality gloves
Exports to U.S.A., South America, Germany, and others
Production capacity of over 360 million pairs per year

title: YCool
description: Cool India Brewing Company pays homage to rich Indian culture and traditions through its distinctive flavoured beers, celebrating legacy and heritage.
results: Unique flavours inspired by Indian traditions
Growing presence in the Indian craft beer market

title: The Game Palacio Gaming Arcade
description: The Game Palacio is the ultimate entertainment hub offering indoor games like boutique bowling, arcade games, VR, trampoline park, and fine dining, ideal for events.
results: Flagship ultra-luxury arcade in Phoenix Palladium, Mumbai

title: Corporate Green Interior
description: Designed a biophilic green interior for ATIT Engineering Industries' Vasai office, incorporating indoor plants and vertical gardens to enhance workspace aesthetics and air quality.

title: Corporate Terrace Garden

title: Corporate Green Interior
description: Transformed Beacon Group's Navsari office with a biophilic design, incorporating preserved moss walls and indoor plants to improve air quality and employee productivity.

title: Corporate Feature Wall
